description:
An assortment of anal toys laid on the ottoman, all different shapes, sizes, and colors. There was a lot of giggling going on.
Rodney and Ford knew what was in store for them, and they had developed a camaraderie in the brief course of a single morning.
"We're going to get each other through it," Ford said. Rodney smiled like a little kid.
I wanted to see both of them get fucked by the real thing, but they had both been "hemming and hawing" about taking it up the ass, so doing this preliminary step would show them it wasn't so bad, really.
So, they were asked to pick a toy. Of course, they both went for the smallest one they could find. Then, they went to opposite ends of the sofa, gave each other a cautious look, and began.
If I had to use one word to describe what took place initially, it would be "awkward." Neither one of them had ever had anything in their poopers before (except for maybe a finger).
"Damn... Damn... Damn..." And so the initiation went.
Their anal muscles finally loosened up and after about 15 minutes they were both impaled on a double-ended dildo...
title: Rodney & Ford: Ass Play
